summary: Established core type patterns and fixed critical exactOptionalPropertyTypes errors in 3 key files

completed_tasks.impact: Fixed 2 TS2345 errors with pid type compatibility
completed_tasks.pattern: Use factory functions for type-safe object creation

completed_tasks.task: Applied all strict types to advanced-memory-commands.ts
completed_tasks.impact: Fixed 4 TS2375 errors with optional property types
completed_tasks.pattern: Build complete objects upfront instead of mutating

completed_tasks.impact: Fixed 2 TS4111 errors with environment variable access
completed_tasks.pattern: Use safeEnv utility for process.env access

completed_tasks.purpose: Enable other agents to apply patterns consistently

patterns_established.name: Strict Type Interfaces
patterns_established.description: Use StrictProcessResult, StrictQueryOptions, etc. from strict-mode-utilities.ts

patterns_established.name: Factory Functions
patterns_established.description: Use createProcessResult, createQueryOptions for type-safe object creation

patterns_established.name: Bracket Notation
patterns_established.description: Use obj['key'] instead of obj.key for index signatures
patterns_established.applicable_to: All Record<string, T> and index signature access

coordination_notes: Patterns are ready for other agents to use

Strict mode utilities are tested and working
Building on Agent #8's critical dependency fixes
